title: Move ~/mage-bench-logs/ into ~/.mage-bench/logs/
description:
Game logs currently go to ~/mage-bench-logs/ while other mage-bench state (YouTube credentials) lives in ~/.mage-bench/. Consolidate by moving logs into ~/.mage-bench/logs/ so all mage-bench files are under one directory.

Files to update:
- puppeteer/src/puppeteer/harness.py (log_dir default)
- puppeteer/src/puppeteer/config.py (LOGS_DIR)
- scripts/export_game.py (LOGS_DIR)
- scripts/upload_youtube.py (LOGS_DIR)
- doc/logging.md
- CLAUDE.md / AGENTS.md references
